div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 692 Nevrokop (mod. Goce Delƒçev; anc. Nicopolis ad Nestum), Bulgaria, 1939 Burial: c. 500-475 B.C. (T) Contents: AR. Small pot hoard Orrescii: 1 st. (as AMNG III.2, pl. 18, 19) Thasos: st.; dr. Disposition: dispersed Gerasimov, BIAB 13 (1939), p. 344
